commands.cmd: echo "workspaceRoot:'${workspaceRoot}' workspaceFolder:'${workspaceFolder}' file:'${file}' fileBasename:'${fileBasename}' fileDirname:'${fileDirname}' fileExtname:'${fileExtname}' fileBasenameNoExt:'${fileBasenameNoExt}' relativeFile:'${relativeFile}'"
commands.message: message "workspaceRoot:'${workspaceRoot}' workspaceFolder:'${workspaceFolder}' file:'${file}' fileBasename:'${fileBasename}' fileDirname:'${fileDirname}' fileExtname:'${fileExtname}' fileBasenameNoExt:'${fileBasenameNoExt}' relativeFile:'${relativeFile}'"
commands.messageAfter: messageAfter "workspaceRoot:'${workspaceRoot}' workspaceFolder:'${workspaceFolder}' file:'${file}' fileBasename:'${fileBasename}' fileDirname:'${fileDirname}' fileExtname:'${fileExtname}' fileBasenameNoExt:'${fileBasenameNoExt}' relativeFile:'${relativeFile}'"
